name: Rewind [0]
description:
Not Your Average Puzzle Platformer.

A Platformer Where You Manipulate Time To Solve Puzzles.

Controls:

ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

SPACE BAR TO JUMP

R TO RECORD TIME

BACKSPACE TO REVERSE TIME

Tip: Everything in Rewind Mode Is Flipped

CREDITS:

Level Design: Aiden Thakurdial

Puzzle Design: Aiden Thakurdial

Music: Aiden Thakurdial

Programming: Aiden Thakurdial

Graphics: Aiden Thakurdial
